com.cognos.CAM_AAA.authentication

Class UnrecoverableException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.cognos.CAM_AAA.authentication.UnrecoverableException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SystemRecoverableException, UserRecoverableException

    public class UnrecoverableException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Indicates that something happened that interferes with the normal operation of a custom provider.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
